Deadfur could not say anything to Razorwing before the Lord was gone.
This =
was a reckless plan at best and if anyone was supposed to pull
that one, it=
 should have been him, not a Lord! But someone less mobile
had to organize =
the ensuing assault.

Deadfur: Silver Wing Platoons 1 and 2, stand ready fo=
r break in on my
mark!

He prepared his own Uzi and a couple of grenades.

=
As soon as he saw Remus and Razorwing get out the window and he
received co=
nfirmation, he got up.

Deadfur: Soldiers, attack! We break the siege now! =
Get me that wall
open now!

A few of the heavy hitters concentrated fire on=
 the outer wall and
managed to tear it down in a matter of moments so that =
Deadfur and his
detachment entered swiftly. He threw a grenade inside and w=
aited for
the explosion before getting in. Of the few bots still standing, =
he
shot through them with decisive force.

Deadfur: We mop up! Those guys a=
re unconscious! Platoon 1, take the
west wing and make sure they're all tie=
d down when they wake up.
Platoon 2, same thing, east wing. Go!

He paused =
for a moment. It had actually worked, they were in and
securing Parliament.=


Deadfur: Razorwing, we're in and sweeping after you. Seems like your
bomb=
 had the expected effect... for now. How about the battle outside?
Can we f=
easably hold the building?
